snippet: The United Nations high commissioner for human rights, Prince Zeid Ra’ad Zeid al-Hussein of Jordan, publicly appealed to Saudi Arabia on Thursday to halt the flogging of a blogger.
abstract: United Nations high commissioner for human rights appeals to Saudi Arabia to halt flogging of blogger Raif Badaw; reminds Saudis that flogging is considered form of torture by UN.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations high commissioner for human rights, Prince Zeid Ra’ad Zeid al-Hussein of Jordan, publicly appealed to Saudi Arabia on Thursday to halt the flogging of a blogger.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: U.N. Denounces Flogging of Blogger
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: U.N. Denounces Caning of Blogger

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
